A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was great! The plot line was pretty unpredictable with plenty of twists and turns. Sadly\, it could have used more character development with some of the new characters coming into the story and characters that were killed off end up having more questions being asked about their past. It does borrow some elements from The Empire Strikes Back\, but it doesn't follow the formula to the bone like The Force Awakens did with A New Hope.
